SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM ( SELECT a.SMS_ID, a.TRNSMIS_TELNO, a.TRNSMIS_CN, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMTNSMSRECPTN s WHERE s.SMS_ID = a.SMS_ID) as RECPTN_CNT, TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNSMS a WHERE 1=1
a.SMS_ID in (SELECT SMS_ID FROM COMTNSMSRECPTN WHERE RECPTN_TELNO LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%')
a.TRNSMIS_CN LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC ) TB ) Z WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(a.SMS_ID) FROM COMTNSMS a WHERE 1=1
a.SMS_ID in (SELECT SMS_ID FROM COMTNSMSRECPTN WHERE RECPTN_TELNO LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%')
a.TRNSMIS_CN LIKE '%' || #searchWrd# || '%'
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNSMS (SMS_ID, TRNSMIS_TELNO, TRNSMIS_CN, FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #smsId#, #trnsmitTelno#, #trnsmitCn#, #frstRegisterId#, SYSDATETIME )
INSERT INTO COMTNSMSRECPTN (SMS_ID, RECPTN_TELNO, RESULT_CODE, RESULT_MSSAGE ) VALUES ( #smsId#, #recptnTelno#, #resultCode#, #resultMssage# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.SMS_ID, a.TRNSMIS_TELNO, a.TRNSMIS_CN, a.FRST_REGISTER_ID, b.USER_NM as FRST_REGISTER_NM, TO_CHAR(a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNSMS a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.FRST_REGISTER_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.SMS_ID = #smsId#
SELECT a.SMS_ID, a.RECPTN_TELNO, a.RESULT_CODE, a.RESULT_MSSAGE FROM COMTNSMSRECPTN a WHERE a.SMS_ID = #smsId#
sqlMap.insert: UPDATE COMTNSMSRECPTN SET RESULT_CODE = #resultCode#, RESULT_MSSAGE = #resultMssage# WHERE SMS_ID = #smsId# AND RECPTN_TELNO = #recptnTelno#
